price: 19. Kaadu diggah, Yallih naqsi Nabii Mucammad isi Rabbi yaqbuduh soole waqdi jinni kay amol sittak bagul sitta qoxxisam akke raarra hee Qhuraan kaak ankacisuh.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
